        • b
          RequestWeather b
          an instance of RequestWeather to provide weather data
        • Bottom
          javax.swing.JPanel Bottom
          Bottom is a Panel that is seperated into 7 colums in the colums panels of the class DayPreview are added
        • btn_getData
          javax.swing.JButton btn_getData
          btn_getData is a button that starts the api-request to get the weather data its function is implemented in the inner class btn_getDataListener
        • btn_getDataListener
          java.awt.event.ActionListener btn_getDataListener
        • Center
          javax.swing.JPanel Center
          center is a JPanel to add the a linechart to represent the temperature
        • content
          javax.swing.JPanel content
          The content Panel is the main Panel of the JFrame, it devides the screen into 3 sections to display different information 1.(top) current weather Information 2.(center) temperature curve 3. forecast for next 7 days
        • days
          DayPreview[] days
          days is an arrays that safes 7 objects of the class DayPreview[]
        • lbl_cloudinessOutput
          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_cloudinessOutput
          lbl_cloudinessOutput is a label that is overwritten to display the current cloudiness in percent
        • lbl_currentTime
          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_currentTime
          lbl_currentTime is a label to display the current time
        • lbl_humidityOutput
          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_humidityOutput
          humidityOutput is a label that will output the humidity

          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_ImageAusgabe

          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_shortDescription
          lbl_shortDescription is a label that is overwritten to output a short description of the current weather
        • lbl_temp
          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_temp
          lbl_temp is a label that is overwritten to display the the current temperaturen in celsius

          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_temperatureGraph
          is a label to display a graph with an forecast for the temperature of the next 24 hours
        • lbl_weekDay
          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_weekDay
          lbl_weekDay is a label that is overwritten to display the current day

          javax.swing.JLabel lbl_windSpeedOutput
          lbl_windSpeedOutput is a label that is overwritten to display current wind speed
        • Top
          javax.swing.JPanel Top
          Top is the panel that displays the provides place for 2 panels to display the current Weather stats
        • TopLeft
          javax.swing.JPanel TopLeft
          TopLeft is a panel that is added to the panel Top to display the following informations: windSpeed, humidity, cloudines it will be desplayed on the right side
        • TopRight
          javax.swing.JPanel TopRight
          TopRight is a panel that is added to the panel Top to display the textField for entering the search city, a JButton to start the search a JTextField to display the weekday and the currentTime, an icon of the weather, and the current temperature in degrees
        • txt_enterCity
          javax.swing.JTextField txt_enterCity
          txt_enterCity is a textField to enter the city of which the user wants to get the weather information for
